title: Bug 2529 - Open/Close project not always available
description: In the Navigator, when both P1 and P2 are selected, the Open Project menu item is available but the Close Project is not.
OB: When both P1 and P2 are selected in the Navigator, the Close Project menu item should be available just like the Open Project menu item is available.
EB: When both P1 and P2 are selected in the Navigator, the Close Project menu item is not available.
SR:
1. Open the Navigator.
2. Select both P1 and P2.
3. Observe the availability of the Open Project and Close Project menu items.
